mdRecord.dcterms:title: 8083. Mount Vernon, Mansion Home of George Washington, Columbian Exposition.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kilburn, B. W. (Benjamin West), 1827-1909
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: James M. Davis, General Agent, 1015 Arch Street, Philadelphia.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of a replica of the Mount Vernon Mansion constructed for the 1893 Columbian Exposition in Chicago, Illinois. Mounted on brown board. Photographed, Published and Copyrighted, 1893, by B. W. Kilburn, Littleton, N. H. James M. Davis, General Agent, 1015 Arch Street, Philadelphia. The reverse of the card bears a stamp from the Exposition's Department of Photography.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Worldâ€™s Columbian Exposition (1893 : Chicago, Ill.)
